name: Tubes and Fountains
description:
This is a platform clicking game where a ghost has tampering with the water pipes connected to a fountain. You're called to reopen those pipes for at least a certain amount of time.

Use the mouse click for moving the character.

Use the sliders for camera tilt and zoom. You can also use the arrow keys and page-up / page-down keys.

This is my first game, made with Godot. I also made graphics and music. If you have issues with mouse clicks, try to move the character a bit far and retry.
